metadata.name: Bad Opsec Defaults Sacrificial Processes With Improper Arguments
metadata.comment: Detects attackers using tooling with bad opsec defaults. E.g. spawning a sacrificial process to inject a capability into the process without taking into account how the process is normally run. One trivial example of this is using rundll32.exe without arguments as a sacrificial process (default in CS, now highlighted by c2lint), running WerFault without arguments (Kraken - credit am0nsec), and other examples.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\werfault.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('werfault.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\regsvcs.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('regsvcs.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\regasm.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('regasm.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\regsvr32.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('regsvr32.exe'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\appdata\\local\\microsoft\\edgeupdate\\install\\{')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32.exe')) OR (contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\appdata\\local\\bravesoftware\\brave-browser\\application\\')) OR contains(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\appdata\\local\\google\\chrome\\application\\'))) AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\installer\\setup.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.parent_process.cmd_line), lower('--uninstall ')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\rundll32.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('rundll32.exe'))))
